price: 10. Mpe ya soló, totindaki batindami yambo nayo, o kati ya bato ba kala.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي شِيَعِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā min qablika fī shiyaʿi al-awalīna
